node.title: After 20 years, the Cat Empire will disband, but not before a fairytale finish
node.alt: Lead singer of a band leaps into the air, while his band play on behind him
node.description: Their energetic performances haveÂ always invited music-lovers to dance and sing along. Now the members of Melbourne's iconic band the Cat Empire say it's time for a change.
node.content:
["The run of upcoming shows\u00a0scheduled to farewell all but two original members of the Cat Empire is an indulgence rarely afforded to bands that decide to split.", "But the planned fairytale finish should not come as a surprise.", "Throughout their 20-year career, the members of the Cat Empire have managed to fiercely guard their creative autonomy, dodge most of rock 'n' roll's usual challenges and make music entirely on their own terms.", "
Success that sticks around
", "In the early 2000s,\u00a0the buzz in Melbourne around the Cat Empire, a six-piece rock band with members still in their teens, was electric.", "", "
The Cat Empire's path to success hasn't followed a typical rock 'n' roll trajectory.(Supplied: Christie Goodwin)
", "They were building a reputation around spontaneous, high-energy live performances.\u00a0Keyboardist Ollie McGill says by growing fans this way the band could enjoy \"success that sticks around\".", "\"A lot of bands get discovered by some producer \u2026 People might be interested in one song but once bands move onto their next album, they might not have that massive hit and people aren't faithful to them,\" he tells ABC RN's Earshot.", "\"Whereas we had more than just a song to sell, we were selling a lifestyle. People came to our shows and saw a bunch of guys having a really good time on stage.\"", "
Doing things their way
", "Singer and percussionist Felix Riebl points to the band's long-time manager, Correne Wilkie, as critical to the Cat Empire's success.", "Described by one band member as \"the fifth Beatle\", Wilkie attended an early gig and decided, on the spot, to pause her dream job in advertising to take on the role.", "\"It was all about paying your rent and having this great time while you do it, but she [Wilkie] said, 'Nah, we're going to do this really well and we're going to sell lots of albums',\" Riebl says.", "", "
Correne Wilkie quit her job to manage the band and secured their independence.(Supplied)
", "But it's how Wilkie went about securing the band's first record deal that empowered the Cat Empire.", "\"My strategy [was] let's not try to sell this thing to record labels until it's actually worth something and by having thousands of people turning up in each city to see the band, we were already presenting value,\" Wilkie says.", "Before eventually deciding to sign with EMI, the band completed all aspects of the debut album, including mastering and artwork.", "\"We [had] something in our hands that we [could] shop around, which is not really the way it's traditionally done,\" says the band's drummer, Will Hull-Brown.", "
'We were still kids'
", "The Cat Empire's self-titled debut was released in 2003 to critical and commercial acclaim.", "", "
The Cat Empire formed when members were still in their teens.(Supplied)
", "Their first single, Hello, was wildly successful.", "\"It, all of a sudden, transformed us from this purely late-night, word-of-mouth band into a band that was playing in people's homes\u00a0and we were still kids!\" Riebl says.", "Despite their young ages, the hype didn't consume them.", "\"It was a great surprise. We weren't obsessed by that being the measure of success,\" Wilkie says. They were, however, obsessed with live performance.", "\"We were actually in the business of creating great live experiences,\" Wilkie explains.", "\"The old way of working in the music industry was, you would go on tour to promote an album. We've always worked the other way; we put out albums to promote our tour,\" he says.", "With their focus on live events, the Cat Empire's follow-up album in 2005, Two Shoes, was blissfully free of pressure.", "\"I don't think we were nervous at all and that might sound strange, but we weren't looking for critical acclaim,\" Wilkie says.", "", "
The band played to thousands of fans on home turf for their 1000th show at Melbourne's Federation Square in 2014.(Supplied)
", "The band had travelled to Cuba in 2004 to chase a sound they'd heard as teenagers on albums by Cuban musical ensemble Buena Vista Social Club.", "\"We smoked cigars, we drank rum \u2014 it all made sense over there,\" Riebl says.", "
A band with 'no blueprint'
", "Throughout their career, the band released eight studio albums and played close to 1,500 live shows and festivals, everywhere from Glastonbury to New York and right across Australia.", "The Cat Empire singer and trumpeter Harry Angus hypothesised to The Music Show's Andrew Ford in 2009 about why his band remained relevant after so many years.", "\"If you want to be in a rock band, you know what kind of haircut you need to have, you know what kind of jeans you need to wear,\" he said.", "\"The music we're making \u2014 there's no blueprint in terms of a look or a culture to fit into. It [is] a mish-mash of everything and so, as a result, we sidestep fashion.\"", "Eleven years later, the Cat Empire's eclectic sound and musicianship is still something Angus is proud of.", "\"Somehow we were able to have a career that is often reserved for rock stars, but do it playing music we grew up listening to, which wasn't represented in the mainstream music world,\" he says.", "
Parting ways on their own terms
", "Just before COVID-19 took hold of the world, many inside the Cat Empire camp began to realise an impending major anniversary for the band could be an opportune moment to call it a day.", "", "
Band members take a moment after entertaining a huge crowd at the 2020 WOMADelaide Festival.(Supplied: Jack Fenby)
", "\"Twenty years is enough time. We've done some amazing things, I'm ready to hang up the boots,\" Hull-Brown says.", "Choosing an amicable farewell tour, instead of a messy break-up, is consistent with the band's autonomy and maturity.", "On top of that, parting members have given their blessing for Riebl and McGill to assemble a new band under the Cat Empire name to keep the party going.", "\"I'm glad that the band gets to continue and have a new life,\" Hull-Brown says.", "While Wilkie and the rest of the band are curious about life outside the Cat Empire, Riebl and McGill look forward to a new vision for the band.", "", "
Internationally renowned band the Cat Empire has always prioritised the live show experience.(Supplied: Ellie Pinney)
", "\"The Cat Empire represents the spark in the night when people come together and forget their everyday, and that doesn't get old,\" Riebl says.", "\"It can evolve, it doesn't have to be the same feeling and the Cat Empire is an outfit that can do that in a way that's unique.\"", "And, no doubt, on its own terms."]
